data.text:
@Essential7com Hi there! We are sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC 
- Charles

@meGa_carnzz We're sorry to hear of your delayed flight and for any inconvenience this may have caused. Please feel free to send us a DM with your flight details...a member of our team will gladly assist in any way possible. - GM

@shelleytulo Hi Shelley! We sincerely appreciate your patience as we work to assist each and every person who reaches out to us for help in the order in which their communication is received. A rep should be coming on the line shortly to assist you. You can also send us a DM. - C

@hopkins_elaine Hi Elaine! Thanks for reaching out. If you are seeking assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ the specifics of your request and a member of our team will be happy to review your options with you ASAP. - C

@MrZeppieri Hello Zach! We are so sorry to hear about this. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any discomfort or distress you may have experienced while traveling with us. If you're in need of assistance or wish to discuss this further, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@Leadn_lady88 We are very sorry to hear of your travel experience. Please feel free to send us a DM if in need of assistance. -JH
@ohheyyimmallory I'm sincerely sorry to hear you feel that way, Mallory. If you need any assistance, please feel free to send us a private message. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@DeniseGabbard Our Customer Care Call Center is available 24/7 at 702-505-8888. You can also send us a private message if you have additional questions! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@Karen_FMN Hi Karen--that policy is part of the federal law requiring masks while on all federal property and commercial flights that was enacted earlier this month. - SG
A little celebration with an Allegiant little one for our 22nd birthday! Plane > Cake. Can't argue that! #CakeIsGood #PlanesAreBetter https://t.co/E8onmp7x4K
@Breanna_Elise Hi Breanna! This is certainly not the policies of conduct for Allegiant Team members. Please send us a DM so that we can review the details of his flight. -JH

@golfkraazy It warms our hearts to hear this! 😊💙🧡💛 
#togetherwefly
@TheOrca_YT That sounds like a blast! There's something for almost everyone to enjoy in Sin City. 😎🛍️🎰 - C

#TAIL us all about your favorite destination!

📸: sukhman.purba https://t.co/Y46D5fPEXc

@the_fit_britt92 We are very sorry to hear about your frustrations. Please feel free to send us a DM if you are in need of assistance. -Nicole
https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC

@suhasin81109473 That's a great question! While we do not require a COVID test to fly, we do recommend that you check the local ordinances where you will be traveling. COVID policies vary from region to region! - SG
@mjallen176 Sounds like a good plan to us! - SG
@nancy75710447 Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Nancy. We will certainly review and address this with our teams. - SG

Sometimes things work out in unexpected ways. Meet Chantel, a former Pharmacy major who found her calling in Advertising!

“My favorite part of my job is the possibilities of what it can be. Being available and flexible to take on more responsibility allowed me to grow.” https://t.co/dMnlKSbM4D
@eric_kavanagh P.S. Congrats on your first tweet! 🙌🙌 - SG
@eric_kavanagh I'm so sorry to hear about your difficulties! If the problem persists, please send us a private message so we can assist! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG
@floraposteraro We are so sorry to hear of your canceled flight. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM so that a member of our team can review your flight details. -JH
@LunatikMedic Hi there! We are so sorry to hear of your delayed flight. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH

@510fungirl We are very sorry for the inconvenience you experienced while trying to reach us, Alicia. Please feel free to send us a DM if you are still in need of assistance. We would be more than happy to help! -Nicole

https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC
@jordanlblackson Hey Jordan. Please send us a DM if in need of assistance. -JH
@acruzweb1 Thanks so much!! - SG
@GoDavidHunt Thanks for sharing the love, David! I hope we'll see you on board again sometime soon! - SG

If you're a go-with-the-flow kind of person, you should know that cabin air always flows down from the top of the cabin and exits through vents near your feet. Air never flows toward the front or back. #GoingTheDistance https://t.co/PIBZIzHmVG
@kindysegovia We're sorry you are having a hard time booking. We recommend to clear your cache and cookies and history in your web browser. Let us know if that helps. - Lupe

@Miha915 Hi Michelle! We are sorry to hear that your dissatisfaction. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC A member of our team will be happy to help ASAP. - C

@pamelaaugust Hi Pamela! Thanks for reaching out. We've made it easier for you to change/cancel your itinerary with no penalties by visiting https://t.co/MeUg2H2g9v. If you need additional assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM. - C
@Sammiedubs Hi Sam! Check your DMs. 🙂 - C

@zmoretz Hi Zac! We're delighted to hear that you enjoy flying with us. Our fares work on a tier-based system, which means that only so many tickets are available at a certain price. Once those lower priced tickets are sold, the ticket prices will go up to the next price level. - C
@Gpinkdistrict Hi G.B! If you have an air-only reservation, please follow this link https://t.co/MeUg2GKFhX. If you have a package reservation, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@Deandra_Turner Hi Deandra! Thanks for reaching out to us. We are sorry to hear that you are having a negative experience with us. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC and a member of our team will be happy to help you ASAP. - C

Dreaming of a summer getaway? 🌺 What about a fall fun-cation? 🍂

Start planning your next escape at https://t.co/Z48IktK9Yu. https://t.co/DkEPEs25Ct

@acruzweb1 What an absolutely beautiful poem! We would love to share this back to our followers. Reply #YesAllegiant to give us permission to use it for marketing purposes. Full T&C --> https://t.co/wzukGZ3ddj

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

data.text: @JordanMorris00 @Fly_Nashville 🙌🙌 - SG

@Emma57774020 Hi Emma! We are sorry to hear that your flight was canceled. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservations details. A member of our team will be happy to review your options with you ASAP. - C
@nicklaneve Hey Nick! We show you have sent us a DM, thank you for your patience. -JH

@re2pectjeta What a good son you are! 😉

The credit is tied to the email address you used to book your original itinerary. But as long as you book with your email address, the credit can be used for any passenger!
@crystal_destef Hi Crystal. Please send us a DM to review the specifics of your flight. -JH

@MackBeasley28 Hi there! We're so sorry to hear of your frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC A member of our team will be happy to help you in any way they can ASAP. - C

@knorm5 Hi Kathy! All of the flights that we will be offering from now through mid-November are available for review and purchase on our official website. If you have additional questions, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - C
@agilson7 We show you have reached out to us via Facebook. Thank you for your patience. -JH

data.text: @daveistheworst Hey David! We certainly apologize for any inconvenience or frustration. If you are in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH

@kurt_gollan Hi Kurt, we would be happy to look into this for you. Please feel free to send us a DM with your confirmation number and email address if you are in need of assistance. -Nicole

https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC

@emilyjordannnnn Hi Emily! Oh goodness, we are so sorry to hear this. If in need of assistance, please send us a PM with your confirmation number, email address on file and the pertinent details of your request. A member of our team would be happy to review. -Jenna
@julianafiguer10 Hey Juliana. We are very sorry to hear of your weather affected flight. Please send us a DM so that a member of our team can better assist. -JH

@kidzbopslut Hi! We are very sorry to hear of your recent experience. What you have stated is by no means Allegiant's culture. We show you have sent us a DM and a member of our team will be with you shortly. -JH
@TStibbe Hi Trisha. We would be happy to review and apologize for the wait. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM. -JH

@Behaute Hi Bailee, we are very sorry to hear about your recent flight cancellations and would be happy to help you. Please send us a DM with your 6-digit confirmation and the email address on file if you are still in need of assistance. -Nicole

https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC
#GoingTheDistance together. https://t.co/CoxOvHmSXn
@MichelleWhisks Hey Michelle! Our system is set to issue vouchers 2 year from the original booking date, during this time. For additional questions, please feel free to send us a PM. -JH

@chad_beier Hi Chad, we are very sorry to hear your flight was canceled. Please feel free to send us a DM with your confirmation number and the email address on file if you are in need of any assistance as we would be more than happy to help! -Nicole

@dimonBLRS We certainly hope to, thanks for the suggestion. -JH

@gergburgler AUS is going to remain closed, all flights will be canceled. Please send us a DM if you are affected by this. -GM

@tarathomasPR We are very sorry to hear this Tara. If you google search Allegiant, many other third-party companies that we are not affiliated with will come up. Please feel free to send us a PM and we'd be happy to review. -JH

data.text: @Mandyrae1911 Hey Amanda, we're sorry to hear this. We see you have sent us a PM, a member of our team with be with you shortly. -JH
@memato4girls So are we! -JH 🙌 💖 🌴
@Xicanalana Hi Xicanalana! If you have any questions, please send us a DM we would be happy to look into this for you. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@riggs_heidi Hi Heidi! We would be happy to look into that for you. Can you send us a DM with your flight number so we may better assist you? - Lupe
@toddmulbarger 💙 🧡 🤗  -JH
@__takeyouthere Unfortunately, we cannot check you in, but you can check in on the mobile app or at the airport. - GM
@feetbytommie If you still need assistance, please send us a DM. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@Tee_and_Wiz It was briefly down, but it's back up now! Now you can get back to planning! 🙌🙌 - SG
@Dorman_JD We'll certainly have our teams take a look! Thanks for the suggestion, J.D.! - SG

@khopkinswrites Unfortunately, we are experiencing a high call volume at the moment but our Call Center is open 24/7 and can be contacted at 702-505-8888. Alternatively, you can send us a private message if you need assistance from our team. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC. - SG
@khopkinswrites Glad we were able to help! - SG
@HeyZeusHdz I'm sincerely sorry to hear about your experience, Jesse. Please send us a private message if you need assistance from our team. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@tubbynolim Hi there, we are very sorry to hear your flight has been canceled. Please feel free to send us a Direct Message if you are in need of any assistance as we would be more than happy to help! -Nicole

📸: liljohndeereboy https://t.co/uABSGMz7rT
@SamuelReno We're sorry for the hold time! Our teams are helping diligently to assist all customers being affected by the winter storm. We truly appreciate your patience. -GM
@countrygirl3424 All surveys are handled and you are always welcome to email your complaint or by sending is a direct message. - GM
@nate_makeup You are welcome to bring your skateboard but it must be checked in and must be in a container or case. - GM
@JayKoehler1 We greatly appreciate the time that you have taken to provide us with this feedback. - GM

@JayKoehler1 help protect themselves and those around them. Our team members are expected to enforce this policy, as well as remain professional and respectful. Allegiant also requires team members to wear a face mask/covering over their mouth and nose at all times.

@JayKoehler1 We are very sorry to learn of the uncomfortable experience you had on this flight, as it is never our intention to cause discomfort during travel. All passengers are required to wear a face mask/covering over their mouth and nose at all times when traveling to
@josh56186096 Hi Josh! You can apply multiple vouchers onto a new bookings. :) - GM

@lucasmiles Hi Lucas! Thanks for reaching out to us. Please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ your reservation details and the specifics of your request. A member of our team will be happy to review your options with you ASAP. - C

@NoFakeBS Hey there! If you have not done so already, we highly recommend signing up for flight alerts on our official website under Flight Status. If you have an existing reservation and questions regarding those flights, please send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC w/ the details. - C

@ChrisCwilli15 Hi Chris! We are sorry to hear about this and want to assure you that we take all customer feedback seriously, as it is how we are able to improve our customer experience. Please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with the details of your experience. - C

@youngpippy The name on the voucher will have no bearing on your ability to use it. To redeem a credit voucher, you must enter the voucher number on the payment screen and confirm the email address that goes with it. If you have additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM. 🙂
@morganpistolesi Thank you so much for the shoutout, Morgan! We sincerely appreciate you. 💙🧡💛 - C
@youngpippy Hi Shanna! Our credit vouchers are not name specific, so they can be used to book travel for anyone of your choosing. - Lupe
@kidzbopslut 🥳😄😄

@JasonCo30672621 I'm so sorry to hear that your flight was canceled, Jason. Please feel free to send us a private message if you'd like someone from our team to review the options available to you. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC - SG

@59fifty9 I recommend using the baggage fees calculator at the link provided, if you do not have an existing reservation that you can check the price of checked bag on. For additional questions or concerns, please send us a DM. - C

@59fifty9 Hi there! A golf bag is considered sporting equipment. Each piece of sporting equipment will be accepted as a checked bag with all applicable fees applied per person, per bag, per segment. The cost of a checked bag varies depending on your flight. https://t.co/k1M1VSh8CN - C

@brettabbotts17 Thanks for the shoutout, Brett! And thank you for taking the time to recognize our representative. 💙 🧡 💛 - C
#togetherwefly

@23JAM_23 Hi Jeff! Thanks for reaching out with this suggestion. We apologize for any frustration you may be experiencing. We actually do not have a defined terminal, as this is subject to change based on operational/airport needs. If you have additional questions, plz send us a DM. - C
@sza8o If you need assistance, please send us a direct message. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje
@mclockphd If you need assistance, please send us a direct message. - GM https://t.co/ehIvBukkje

@trish_ks Hi Trish! Thanks for reaching out to us. If you are in need of assistance, please feel welcome to send us a DM: https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC with your reservation details. A member of our team will be happy to review your options with you ASAP. - C

@joelberghorst Hi Joel! We are very sorry to hear of your delayed flight. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM with your confirmation number, email address on file and details of your request. -JH
@jarrodbrower Hi Jarrod, we are sorry to hear this. If in need of assistance, please send us a DM to review your flight details. -JH
@alwaysgone82 Hey Chris. We see you have reached out to us via DM. A member of our team will be with you shortly. Thank you for your patience. -JH

@JessieIsBitter Hi Jessie! Thanks for reaching out. Each fare paying passenger is entitled to one free personal item within the dimensions of 7x15x16in. As an ultra low-cost carrier, we do charge for any additional items as Carry On/Checked Bags. Send us a DM, if you have other questions. - C
@TangelaRichh Hi! Please send us a DM with your flight information, we'd be happy to review. -JH
